attributes.additional_details:
Having experienced existing providers Standguide & A4E [Yellow Pages unsuitable search-tool & available at-home] pitching-for unadvertised-jobs in a hostile & often-dangerous environment is poor-value for TAXPAYER.

Underwriting-unemployment makes finding-opportunities all-the-more difficult.

It's cheaper to pay BT the annual broadband-fee than that given to Standguide & A4E.
